scripts.backend:dev: cd backend && uv run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.backend:lint: cd backend && uv run ruff check . && uv run ruff format --check .
scripts.ingest:lint: cd ingestion && uv run ruff check . && uv run ruff format --check .
scripts.ingest:test: cd ingestion && uv run python -m pytest
scripts.ingest:sample: cd ingestion && uv run python -m ingestion.cli ingest --sample
scripts.ingest:run: cd ingestion && uv run python -m ingestion.cli ingest
